name: Chinese Braised Lamb Shanks
description: For this recipe, two lamb shanks are seared and then braised for about two hours before being simmered in a fragrant mixture of soy, ginger and a few other things. Sauté some bok choy, stir it into the simmer and serve it all over rice. It is a savory Sunday night supper.
keywords: bok choy, lamb shanks, rice, main course
recipeIngredient: Juice from Slow-Braised Lamb Shanks, plus water or stock to make 1 cup
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

2 cups bok choy, chopped
into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text:
Combine all ingredients except
the bok choy, oil, rice and scallions in
large pot that can later be covered; bring
to a boil and simmer, covered, until
the flavors have melded, about 15 minutes.

Sauté the bok choy in the oil until
tender; stir it into the stew at the last
minute and serve over rice, garnished
with the scallions.
